text: Hamilcar Barca or Barcas ( c. 275â€“228 BC) was a Carthaginian general. He was the father of Hannibal, Hasdrubal Barca and Mago. He was also father-in-law to Hasdrubal the Fair. Hamilcar commanded the Carthaginian land forces in Sicily from 247 BC to 241 BC, at the end of the First Punic War. Category:Carthaginian people Category:270s BC births Category:220s BC
title: Hamilcar Barca
